MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L2 and L3 postcode areas of Liverpool, affecting properties in Pier Head, Old Churchyard and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:57AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday Today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:04AM on 14th January 2021
